Uses of Class
com.azure.data.cosmos.CosmosItemRequestOptions

  • Packages that use CosmosItemRequestOptions 
    Package Description
    com.azure.data.cosmos
    This package provides Rx interfaces for interacting with Azure Cosmos DB.
    com.azure.data.cosmos.sync
    This package provides synchronous interfaces for interacting with Azure Cosmos DB.
